item.title: The Penguin Does Not Disappoint
item.description: Not only is it a great comic-book show, it’s a great show, period.

item.title: America Needs to Take Its Own Side in the Fight against the Houthis
item.description: The United States should capitalize on the opportunity created by Israel’s efforts to weaken Iran’s proxies.

item.title: In Venice, the Biennale Goes from the Heavens to the Slammer
item.description: Pavilions for Ethiopia, Australia, and the Holy See revisit the ‘outsider’ shibboleth.

item.title: Making Pam Bondi a Successful Reformist AG
item.description: Bondi is going to be confirmed. She is going to be the attorney general. That’s when her real challenges start.

item.title: How Biden Transformed the Education Department and Helped Defeat Harris
item.description: The directive to reorient the department’s statutory mission came from President Biden on his very first day in office.
